title: Random FPS Drops
body: Normally have around 200 in very high settings, however Ive been dropping randomly to like 2 for a few seconds randomly in games. Even if I lower the settings to nothing it will still drop.

replies.body:
FPS Issues can be caused by a handful of factors, however, the most common causes are display driver or windows power setting issues. In our [FPS guide,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) you can find the most common solutions for this, so I recommend you check it out.

Let me know if you continue to experience issues after taking those steps.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/2bKEUv2L-new-league-client-causes-random-fps-drops-during-game?show=new 

Is there any truth in this since its still in alpha?
The Alpha Client should only affect your experience *prior* to entering a match, so I don't believe so.

the last few games a couple people have complained about this, and i have noticed that im a bit jumpy as well i usually have 400 fps or higher (capped at 120) and while it still says im at 120, teleporting between 1 frame and the next is definitly not normal if im at 120. ping was around 55 which is normal ping for me in any game. it seems the preseason has broke a lot of things in my opinion.
